title: Kristin Cavallari shares sultry snaps from picturesque Cabo vacation
description: Kristin Cavallari showed off her incredible figure while enjoying a sunny getaway to Cabo, Mexico over the weekend.
content:
Kristin Cavallari showed off her incredible figure while enjoying a sunny getaway to Cabo, Mexico over the weekend.

The Laguna Beach alum, 38, sizzled in a tiny brown bikini as she relaxed by the pool in sultry Instagram snaps she shared from her vacation.

The star's two-piece swimsuit drew attention to her recent boob job. Kristin had previously shared that she underwent the procedure due to a health issue.

Another photo captured the mom-of-three floating on her back in a beachfront pool.

There was also a striking photo of her posing with her back to the camera, her hand entwined in her wet hair.

'Cabo made me do it,' she captioned the post.

Her 4.9 million fans and followers were thrilled, with one writing, 'Kristin you still look as amazing as you did back in your Laguna Beach days.'

'Ok girl you need to share your workout cuz you look amazing!!!!'

'That pool!! The beach! That bod!' someone else chimed in.

The blonde beauty also took to her Instagram Stories, sharing a leggy snap of herself in a zebra print mini dress inside her hotel room.

Elsewhere on her Stories, Kristin gave a glowing endorsement for her beach read, The Compound by Aisling Rawle.

She shared a photo of the book cover with the caption, 'Can't put it down.'

The Compound is a dystopian thriller about a young woman named Lily who wakes up on a remote desert compound where she must complete against nineteen other contestants on a popular reality TV show.

In late May, the jewelry designer announced that she had to have her 'boobs redone' recently after an issue popped up.

'My intuition was saying, redo your boobs. Go get your boobs checked out, at least a consultation,' the reality TV diva shared on her Let's Be Honest podcast.

She went to a plastic surgeon in Nashville who 'seemed a little concerned' about her right implant.

'What we decided was, "OK, well, you get in there and see what's going on," because we knew something was up,' Cavallari continued.

She said, 'My boobs were not laying how I wanted them to lay, but just chalked it up to having the implants for eight years. Getting in to see the surgeon confirmed it was much more.

'He gets in there and I have a ruptured implant, and there is no way of knowing how long this implant was ruptured for,' she explained.

'Because my implant was ruptured, my body then formed a huge piece of scar tissue around it, which is good because it, kind of, like, holds it all in place. It's your body's way of protecting itself.'

Cavallari added, 'That's why my right boob was definitely not laying right. And it was f***ed up.'

It was 'crazy' to have that scare.

'I have no idea when that happened. I have no idea how long that's been going on for,' Cavallari continued.

Aside from the recent health scare, the star has also been busy with work. Last month Kristin described the type of man she'd like to date next on an episode of her podcast.

The former MTV personality chatted all things dating with matchmaker Patti Stanger.

The women were discussing NFL players when Cavallari suddenly had the idea: 'You know what would be great is like, a coach.'

Kristin — whose former NFL star ex-husband Jay Cutler just came under fire — said she's 'too old for athletes now.'

She then asked rhetorically: 'Where are the hot coaches?'

'Some of them are hot,' she gushed. 'You'll see a photo and you're like, excuse me, who is that man?'

Patti agreed, 'They're always in their 40s and really sexy, and they have scruff and nice hair.'

Weighing the downside, Kristin added, 'The problem is they work a lot.'

The blonde bombshell mentioned that she's 'seen a couple coaches' on the exclusive dating app Raya, adding, 'Maybe I should start scrolling again, actually.'

Last year she dated TikTok star Mark Estes for seven months, making headlines for their 13-year age gap.

The Uncommon James founder was previously married to ex-husband Jay from 2013 until she filed for divorce in 2020. It was finalized in 2022.

They share sons Camden, 12, Jaxon, 11, and daughter Saylor, nine.
summary: Kristin Cavallari, a 38-year-old reality TV star, has shared sultry snaps from her vacation in Cabo, Mexico. The photos, which included a two-piece swimsuit and a beach read by Aisling Rawle, showed her stunning figure and a relaxing pose. She had previously shared that she underwent the procedure due to a health issue. The jewelry designer had to have her 'boobs redone' redone after an issue arose. She went to a plastic surgeon in Nashville and confirmed that she had a ruptured implant, which caused her body to form a large piece of scar tissue around it. Despite the health scare, she has been busy with work and dating.
shortSummary: Kristin Cavallari showcased her ample bikini-clad figure while on holiday in Cabo, Mexico, following a recent boob job scare and promoting her new book.

She shared racy images to her Instagram page in promotion of her new collection for her jewelry line Uncommon James.
Thebeauty paired the thin knit tie top with gray sweat bottoms, flashing her incredible toned midsection.
The busty blonde also posed in another bra-free look, opting for a gray sweat set consisting of baggy bottoms and a sleeves crop top.
The stunning star's racy jewelry snaps comes just days after a teaser clip of her upcoming reality show Honestly Cavallari: The Headline tour dropped, revealing her reaction to a d**k picture Harry Jowsey sent her.

Kristin Cavallari flashes sculpted bikini body (and new boob job) in sexy swimsuit during family getaway
- Have YOU got a story? Email tips@dailymail.com
Kristin Cavallari has been working hard this swimsuit season.
The star, 38, displayed her incredibly toned physique in sexy white bikini by Monday Swimwear in new photos posted Thursday.
The Laguna Beach alum, 38, included several bikini snaps in a new upload documenting her family getaway to the Bahamas.
'Vacation mode with this Motley Crue,' she captioned the post.
Kristin looked absolutely phenomenal as she posed about in the tiny string bikini, which she accessorized with a floppy straw hat, sunglasses, and Chloe slides.
The tiny swimsuit also showcased her new boob job, which she candidly spilled the details on last month.
Kristin Cavallari showed off her summer body during a getaway to the Bahamas in photos posted Thursday
Kristin's lavish getaway included access to a lush pool with water slide (which the kids took full advantage of) along with time with friends Austin Rhodes and Justin Anderson and her three children, Saylor, nine, and sons Jaxon, 10, and Camden, 12.
She also did enjoy a bit of a cheat day in her diet, as she feasted on a tasty dish.
While Kristin does ordinarily watch what she eats, she doesn't restrict herself when she's on vacation.
'When I go out to eat or go on vacation, I eat whatever I want and then I really enjoy it,' she told Us Weekly back in 2021.
Detailing her workout routine, Kristin said she does a mixture of weight lifting, circuit training, and the occasional hot yoga class.
'Like everyone else, my workout and health routine has been up and down during quarantine, but I finally have gotten back on track,' she told the publication.
'I lift weights, but I do circuit training to keep my heart rate up. I also started doing hot yoga every once in a while. I don’t do it as often as I would like, but I love it when I’m able to make it happen,' she said.
'I eat with my kids every night at 5:15 p.m,' she also said. 'I find that I sleep better when I eat early like that. And I eat enough so that I’m not hungry before I go to bed.'
Kristin shares her three children with ex-husband Jay Cutler.
Cavallari was sizzling as she stopped by an eatery
Kristin was joined by her children and two friends for the trip
She enjoyed a bit of a cheat day with a tasty dish
Last week, Kristin revealed the new custody arrangement with Jay.
'I did have my kids full-time for a while, and now I have them except for every other weekend,' Kristin said on her Let's Be Honest podcast.
Adding: 'I'm not gonna get into the reasoning or the legality of it.'
She was married to former football player Jay Cutler from 2013 until they split in April 2020, with their divorce finalized in June 2022.
In August 2022, Kristin said on the Call Her Daddy podcast that their relationship was 'toxic' and that she ignored the 'red flags' when she first called off their engagement in July 2011 before reuniting five months later and tying the knot.

argos_summary: Kristin Cavallari showcased her stunning figure in a brown bikini during a recent vacation in Cabo, Mexico, drawing attention to her recent breast augmentation due to a ruptured implant. She shared sultry photos on Instagram, receiving praise from her followers for her appearance. In addition to her vacation snaps, Cavallari discussed her health scare on her podcast, where she emphasized the importance of getting her implants checked after experiencing issues.
